string.name: about_learnmore_html
string.a: Learn more about CWT To Go

resources.string: Free 3 month upgrade to CWT To Go for every booking

Please approve opting in to marketing communications from us, so we will be able to occasionally send you relevant updates covering product releases, new features, tips and tricks, hotels deals and other useful information. \n\nYou can fine tune and select specific information you want to receive by changing your subscription preferences on worldmate.com.

All Your Travel Plans in One Place
Looking for a restaurant for a team dinner? Should you pack a sweater or an umbrella? Access a variety of tools to make traveling even easier.
In order to enjoy the full benefit of CWT To Go, all requested permissions are required.\n\nPlease sign up again.

string.name: cwt_sign_in_cwtg_and_active_txt
string.Data:
Welcome to the new CWT To Go powered by WorldMate! We’ve redesigned and enhanced our award-winning app to better serve your on-the-go needs.

Plus, the password you use to access the CWT Portal website is now your CWT Account password, allowing you to access CWT To Go AND CWT Portal with the same password!

Note: Your previous CWT To Go password is no longer valid.

string.name: cwt_sign_in_no_cwtg_and_active_txt
string.Data:
Welcome to CWT To Go powered by WorldMate!

To get started, please enter your CWT Account password, which is the password you use to access your CWT Portal website.

Please enter your CWT Account password

string.name: cwt_sign_in_uset_sign_in_again_txt
string.Data:
Welcome!

Please enter your CWT Account password

string.name: cwt_sign_in_cwtg_and_inactive_txt
string.Data:
Welcome to the new CWT To Go powered by WorldMate! We’ve redesigned and enhanced our award-winning app to better serve your on-the-go needs.

To access CWT To Go, please register for a new CWT Account. It only takes a few minutes and once set-up is complete, you can use the same email address and password to access CWT To Go and your CWT Portal website!


Choose a password:

string.name: cwt_sign_in_no_cwtg_and_inactive_txt
string.Data:
Welcome to the new CWT To Go powered by WorldMate!

To get started, please register for a CWT Account. It only takes a few minutes and once set-up is complete, you can use the same email address and password to access CWT To Go and your CWT Portal website!


Choose a password:

string.name: cwt_sign_in_active_not_verified_txt
string.Data:
Thank you for creating your CWT Account.

Please follow directions found in an email that has been sent to your registered address to verify your account.

If you don’t receive the email, please check your spam or junk mail filter or:

Click here to resend

string.name: cwt_sign_in_active_not_verified_bottom_txt
string.Data: Did you already verify your account? Click here to sign in.

string.name: cwt_sign_in_error_page_txt
string.Data:
Dear Traveler,

Your current travel profile configuration does not enable use of CWT To Go. Additional information and instructions have been sent to your email address.

Be sure to check your spam or junk mail filter if you don’t find the email in your inbox.

string.name: cwt_sign_in_error_page_txt_unkonwn_user
string.Data:
We’re Sorry!

We were unable to find your email address. Please validate the email entered is correct and try again.

If the email entered is correct, your travel profile configuration does not enable use of CWT To Go.

Additional information and instructions have been sent to your email address.

Be sure to check your spam or junk mail filter if you do not find the email in your inbox.

string.name: cwt_simple_sign_up_bottom_txt_1
string.Data: By signing in you agree to our Terms of Use

resources.string: An email has been sent to your email address
Check-out date must be after check-in date
Check in date is in the past
We cannot accept a reservation for longer than 28 days

string.name: reservation_room_acknowledge_paragraph
string.Data: By completing this reservation, I acknowledge that I have read and understood the cancellation policy for this rate.

resources.string: I am aware that payment for this reservation is paid to the hotelier directly upon checkout and that if I do not arrive for my reservation and/or do not cancel this reservation outside of the cancellation policy terms I will be liable to pay any cancellation fee penalties due to the hotelier.
Thank you for booking with CWT To Go
Your cancellation number is %1$s.\nPlease retain this cancellation number for future reference.
Please check the cancellation policy for this hotel as penalties may apply.\nDo you wish to proceed with the cancellation?
As you requested, we\'ve canceled your reservation. We appreciate your business and we hope you will stay with us on your next trip.

A#Alpha::D#Digit::N#Alpha, Digit::X#Alpha, Digit, ampersand (&), asterisk (*), at sign (@), hypen (-), forward slash (/), period (.), underscore (_), equal (=), colon (:), open/closed brackets ( )::Y#Alpha, Digit, space, ampersand (&), asterisk (*), at sign (@), hypen (-), forward slash (/), period (.), underscore (_), equal (=), colon (:), open/closed brackets ( )
